name: Cyber Wars (itch)
description:
Cyber Wars is an immersive text and GUI game that takes you into a futuristic decayed cyberpunk urban world. Do you have what it takes to survive until the next day? Cyber Wars is a game where you play the role of a street punk/dealer, in a futuristic decayed world. In a high-tech crime-dominated world, try and survive until the next day. Your goal is to make as much money as you can by buying and selling items. Face challenges from NPCs that roam the streets of the city. Make your way from street punk to lord. Once you become a lord, you'll stop paying protection fees and start collecting them!

Features:
- Different locations and markets.

- Buy, sell and use products.

- Use loans from a bank.

- Manage your bank account.

- Fend of negative opponents by running, fighting, bribing, etc.

- Purchase power-ups to better perform in incidents.

- Advance through 5 ranks from street punk to lord.

- Game statistics and score.

- Customizable options.

- Complete soundtrack, feature great futuristic music

- Much more ...
